ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | msdcn.x | |- X = ( Base ` M ) |
| 2 |  | msdcn.d | |- D = ( dist ` M ) |
| 3 |  | msdcn.j | |- J = ( TopOpen ` M ) |
| 4 |  | msdcn.2 | |- K = ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_msmet2 | |- ( M e. MetSp -> ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) e. ( Met ` X ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( MetOpen ` ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) ) = ( MetOpen ` ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6, 4 | #P_metdcn2 | |- ( ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) e. ( Met ` X ) -> ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) e. ( ( ( MetOpen ` ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) ) tX ( MetOpen ` ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) ) ) Cn K ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( M e. MetSp -> ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) e. ( ( ( MetOpen ` ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) ) tX ( MetOpen ` ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) ) ) Cn K ) ) |
| 9 | 2 | #P_reseq1i | |- ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) = ( ( dist ` M ) |` ( X X. X ) ) |
| 10 | 3, 1, 9 | #P_mstopn | |- ( M e. MetSp -> J = ( MetOpen ` ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10, 10 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( M e. MetSp -> ( J tX J ) = ( ( MetOpen ` ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) ) tX ( MetOpen ` ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) ) ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( M e. MetSp -> ( ( J tX J ) Cn K ) = ( ( ( MetOpen ` ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) ) tX ( MetOpen ` ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) ) ) Cn K ) ) |
| 13 | 8, 12 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( M e. MetSp -> ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) e. ( ( J tX J ) Cn K ) ) |
